alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued November 26 at 9:44AM PST until November 26 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less at times in freezing fog, especially near the Columbia and Yakima Rivers. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Washington. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Several reports of vehicle accidents have been reported by law enforcement south of the Tri-Cities along Interstate 82.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.
